project_abstract.cdata: The Gujarat Rural Roads Project seeks to enable the Government of Gujarat to pursue institutional and technical objectives while introducing modernizing elements into the construction industry.  Specifically, the project comprises:  (i) a program of construction, reconstruction and improvement of about 4,042 km of village roads; (ii) the procurement of construction equipment, vehicles, and laboratory equipment; and (iii) the construction of office buildings, warehouses, workshops, and housing.  Further to this, the project provides (iv) engineering and consulting services for project planning, design, supervision, and monitoring, and for staff training; (v) technical assistance for a road maintenance study and (vi) the preparation of a road safety program.
